#include<stdio.h>
 
long int arr[1000001]={0};
 
long gcd(long y,long z)
{
	if(z==0)
	return y;
	else
	return gcd(z,y%z);
}
 
long fibnocii(long num)
{
	if(arr[num]==0)
	{
		if(num<=1)
		arr[num]=num;
		else
		arr[num]=(fibnocii(num-1)+fibnocii(num-2))%1000000007;
 
	}
	return arr[num]%1000000007;
}
 
 
int main()
{
	long int test,y,z;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&y,&z);
		long res=gcd(y,z);
		printf("%d\n",fibnocii(res));
	}
	return 0;
}
